attributes.action: Rethink direction of Building Better, Building Beautiful Commission
attributes.background: The well-publicised views of the head of this commission will take design and architecture backwards. The Secretary for State needs to reconsider the objectives of the commission to ensure the UK remains a vibrant and forward-thinking place for housing design.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
